title: Slumped Unconscious
instructions: In step 1 and step 2 of this activity, you'll be looking at some sentences to identify useful chunks and discuss their meaning and use with the whole class. Then, in step 3, you'll be using some of those phrases to try to guess and recreate a true story. Feel free to get your creative juices going. In step 4, you'll be shown the story where the phrases come from. Just follow the instructions of each step.
tasks: 1) Notice some useful phrases in these sentences.
2) Focus on the highlighted ones. What do they mean? How would you use them? Give examples.
3) The phrases are from a true story, listed in random order. Drag and drop to reorder them as you like. Can you guess what happened? When you're done, share your story.
4) Click on the link and read the original story.
